testCases.label: Test case with no duplicates (Expected: False)
testCases.description: Verifies that the method correctly returns 'false' when the input array {1, 2, 3, 4, 5} contains unique elements.

testCases.label: Test case with duplicates (Expected: True) - adjacent values
testCases.description: Verifies that the method correctly returns 'true' when the input array {1, 2, 2, 3, 4, 5} contains duplicates (e.g., 2 is repeated).

testCases.label: Test case with all duplicate values (Expected: True)
testCases.description: Verifies that the method correctly returns 'true' when all elements in the array {1, 1, 1, 1, 1} are identical.

testCases.label: Test case with duplicates (Expected: True) - non-adjacent values
testCases.description: Verifies that the method correctly returns 'true' when the input array {5, 8, 3, 4, 5, 0} contains duplicates that are separated (e.g., 5 is repeated).
